Package adrenaline.data.data_for_server.data_for_game

Interface DataForController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionBuilder, BoardsRequest, ChosenEffect, ChosenMapSetUp, ChosenPowerUp, ChosenPowerUpEffect, ChosenSpawnPointSetUp, ChosenTargets, ChosenWeapon, DiscardedWeapon, MapRequest, MyBoardRequest, NewPosition, NewPositionAndGrabbed, RankingRequest, ReloadResponse, SquareDetailsRequest, TagbackResponse
    public interface DataForController
    This interface is implemented by every class that has the purpose of notifying the model of any changes during a match
